title: How to allow contacts to ring phone when DND is on.
content: I recently updated to android 11 and this stopped working. It even worked on beta versions of 11 but no more. I keep DND on always so I don't get bothered by spammers but I would like calls from anyone in my contact list to ring the same as if DND is off.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
